description.definition: Virtual Set Size : Indicates how much virtual memory is associated with the process.
description.title: VSS

description.definition: Resident Set Size : Indicates how many physical pages are associated with the process.
description.title: RSS

description.definition: Policy -- Determines how an app should be treated by Android's memory. FG : Foreground, BG : Background
description.title: PCY

description.definition: Name of the user that started the task
description.title: UID

description.definition: Percentage of the CPU for user processes
description.title: User %

description.definition: Percentage of the CPU for system processes
description.title: System %

description.definition: Percentage of the CPU Input Output Wait
description.title: IOW %

description.definition: Percentage of the CPU time spent servicing/handling hardware Interrupt Requests
description.title: IRQ %

description.definition: Percentage of CPU time spent on low priority processes and been niced.
description.title: Nice

description.definition: CPU for system processes. The  time  the  CPU  has  spent  running  the  kernel  and  its processes.
description.title: Sys

description.definition: CPU time spent servicing/handling hardware Interrupt Requests
description.title: IRQ

description.definition: CPU time spent servicing/handling software Interrupt Requests
description.title: SIRQ

description.definition: Time spent running non kernel code. (user time, including nice time)
description.title: us

description.definition: Time spent running kernel code. (system time)
description.title: sy
